summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2054, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue and Fourth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, from Pike Street to Washington Street, by the installation of a system of arc or cluster lights, as may be selected by the Board of Public Works; under Ordinance No. 20606, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
